author: Anonymous Atom
title: Are we allowed to use any procedure as long as it is in the DrRacket Help Database?
question: hi, during my second lab I used the function string-suffix?, which was a command i found on this page https://docs.racket-lang.org/reference/strings.html. during my breakout room with my TA, he wasn't sure if I was allowed to utilize this function since it wasn't something that he covered when he took the course, so I was just wondering if this was allowed. thank you so much!
instructor_answer:
The file about is not what you should be referencing.  That is full Racket which is both a larger and in important ways different language.  I suggest you google for
"racket beginning student XXX"
where XXX is what you are looking for.
